docs.snippet: By the arrival of the Cunard steamship Africa at this port, yesterday, we receive London and Liverpool advices to the 3d inst.--four days later. Parliament having adjourned, the political intelligence from Great Britain is without any importance.
docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the Cunard steamship Africa at this port, yesterday, we receive London and Liverpool advices to the 3d inst.--four days later. Parliament having adjourned, the political intelligence from Great Britain is without any importance.

docs.snippet: The plans for the Central Park are now undergoing examination at the hands of the Commissioners, and it is perfectly fair to suggest one or two points which deserve more notice than they are likely to receive, in arriving at any decision on the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The plans for the Central Park are now undergoing examination at the hands of the Commissioners, and it is perfectly fair to suggest one or two points which deserve more notice than they are likely to receive, in arriving at any decision on the merits of the competing schemes.

docs.snippet: THE FIRST WARNING.--The arrival of the United States steam-frigate Susquchanna in our harbor, with the yellow fever on board, at this early season of the year, should have the effect of opening the eyes of our public authorities to the absolute...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE FIRST WARNING.--The arrival of the United States steam-frigate Susquchanna in our harbor, with the yellow fever on board, at this early season of the year, should have the effect of opening the eyes of our public authorities to the absolute necessity of taking efficient steps to prevent the introduction of this much-dreaded disease among us the coming Summer.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The Policy shop or Exchange Office--What it is, and how its Business is done. EXONERATED FROM THE CHARGE OF MALPRACTICE.

docs.snippet: Brooklyn Horticultural Society. The Spring Exhibition of the Horticultural Society of Brooklyn opened on Wednesday, at the Athenaeum, with an excellent assortment of the choicest of floral beauties. This Society is running a very close race with the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brooklyn Horticultural Society. The Spring Exhibition of the Horticultural Society of Brooklyn opened on Wednesday, at the Athenaeum, with an excellent assortment of the choicest of floral beauties. This Society is running a very close race with the one in New-York. Indeed, it would be a difficult task to set forth a more tempting show than that which covers the tables over tile

docs.snippet: If we believed the relations of France with England and with Europe to be absolutely dependent upon the tone of the leading journals on either side of the Channel, we should regard the definite rupture of the Anglo-French alliance as a near impending...
docs.lead_paragraph: If we believed the relations of France with England and with Europe to be absolutely dependent upon the tone of the leading journals on either side of the Channel, we should regard the definite rupture of the Anglo-French alliance as a near impending certainty, and the outbreak of a great European war as a crisis close at hand.

docs.snippet: The sixth American edition of The Homoeopathic Domestic Physicain, by CONSTANTINE HEING, M. D., has been published by RASSE, of this City, containing additions from the Eleventh German Edition, and forming a complete manual for family practice of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The sixth American edition of The Homoeopathic Domestic Physicain, by CONSTANTINE HEING, M. D., has been published by RASSE, of this City, containing additions from the Eleventh German Edition, and forming a complete manual for family practice of the homoeopathic treatmen: indeed the dircetions are so full and so easily understood that every man may be his own physician--on the homoeopathic system.

headline.main: INTERESTING FROM HAVANA.; Ceremonies of Holy Week--An Affray in Church--Royal Festivities--Grand Boatrace--The Lottery--Naval and Military Displays--Capture of Slavers.

docs.lead_paragraph: The ceremonies of Holy Week passed off this year with greater eclat than on any former occasion. The clouds were kind enough to dispense with their customary showers, so that all the out-door operations, including the visit to the sepulchres and the grand burial of Christ, were gone through with in strict accordance with the ritual of Holy Mother tile Church.

docs.snippet: Not the least curious, and certainly the most useful, of the vast system of improvements now in execution at Paris, is the underground operations for sewerage, and water and gas purposes. Like the distribution of the vessels of the human body, this...

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN FRANCE.; The Sewers of Paris--Styles of Architecture--Artesian Well, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: Not the least curious, and certainly the most useful, of the vast system of improvements now in execution at Paris, is the underground operations for sewerage, and water and gas purposes. Like the distribution of the vessels of the human body, this vast plexus of subterranean communication forms the secretary and excretory ducts, which give life and energy to the city.
